entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. 60 percent chance of light snow near the Ogilvie mountains. Drifting snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Occasional drifting snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
